definitions.definition: God’s help and protection, or a prayer asking for this

examples.text: They asked God's blessing on their pastoral work.
The blessing was said in Hebrew.

definitions.definition: approval of or permission for something

examples.text: The government **gave its blessing** to the new plans.
He went off to Latin America with his mother's blessing.
She received the full blessing of her employers.
The budget was pushed through by the government without the blessing of the opposition.

definitions.definition: something that is good or helpful

examples.text: Lack of traffic is one of the blessings of country life.
**It's a blessing** that nobody was in the house at the time.
Her instant success turned out to be more of a curse than a blessing.

definitions.definition: something that seems to be a problem at first, but that has good results in the end

examples.text: Losing your job might turn out to be a blessing in disguise.

definitions.definition: to be grateful for the good things in your life
